languages.text: {n}Техножрец выглядит как прежде... но иначе. Болезненная аура мученика сменилась ровным и мощным ореолом целеустремленности. В движениях мехадендритов чувствуется грация непостижимого танца. Шрамы былых потерь и сомнений превратились в темные нити на сияющем теле уверенности в следующем шаге.{/n}

{n}The Tech-Priest looks the same as before... yet different. His morbid aura of martyrdom has given way to a calm and powerful halo of purposefulness. His mechadendrites move with the grace of an inscrutable dance. The scars left by loss and doubt have turned into dark threads on a radiant body confident in its next step.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Техножрец выглядит как прежде... но иначе. Болезненная аура мученика сменилась ровным и мощным ореолом целеустремленности. В движениях мехадендритов чувствуется грация непостижимого танца. Шрамы былых потерь и сомнений превратились в темные нити на сияющем теле уверенности в следующем шаге.{/n}

His mechadendrites move with the grace of an inscrutable dance. The scars left by loss and doubt have turned into dark threads on a radiant body of confidence in his next step.{/n}

languages.text: {n}技術司祭はこれまでと変わりなく見えて…実際は、異なっている。病的な殉教者精神は、穏やかで力強い意志へと変化していた。機械触手は不可解な踊りを優雅に見せている。喪失と疑念の傷痕は、次の一歩を確信して輝く身体で、黒い糸となった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest looks the same as before... yet different. His morbid aura of martyrdom has given way to a calm and powerful halo of purposefulness. His mechadendrites move with the grace of an inscrutable dance. The scars left by loss and doubt have turned into dark threads on a radiant body confident in its next step.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}技術司祭はこれまでと変わりなく見えて…実際は、異なっている。病的な殉教者精神は、穏やかで力強い意志へと変化していた。機械触手は不可解な踊りを優雅に見せている。喪失と疑念の傷痕は、次の一歩を確信して輝く身体で、黒い糸となった。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡看起来似乎和之前一样……但又有所不同。他原本病态的殉道气质，已被冷静有力的坚定所取代。他的机械触须优雅移动着，构成了某种不可思议的舞蹈。他的身体容光焕发，充满了对未来的自信。昔日的失却与怀疑留下的伤害已几近弥合，成了模糊的暗线。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest looks the same as before... yet different. His morbid aura of martyrdom has given way to a calm and powerful halo of purposefulness. His mechadendrites move with the grace of an inscrutable dance. The scars left by loss and doubt have turned into dark threads on a radiant body confident in its next step.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡看起来似乎和之前一样……但又有所不同。他原本病态的殉道气质，已被冷静有力的坚定所取代。他的机械触须优雅移动着，构成了某种不可思议的舞蹈。他的身体容光焕发，充满了对未来的自信。昔日的失却与怀疑留下的伤害已几近弥合，成了模糊的暗线。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le technoprêtre ne semble pas avoir changé... et pourtant, il est différent. L'aura de martyr qui l'entourait a laissé place à un halo de calme détermination tandis que ses mécadendrites se balancent avec grâce, comme si elles esquissaient quelque pas d'une danse impénétrable. Sur son corps irradiant d'une inébranlable assurance, les cicatrices de la perte et du doute ne sont plus que de fines entailles sombres.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest looks the same as before... yet different. His morbid aura of martyrdom has given way to a calm and powerful halo of purposefulness. His mechadendrites move with the grace of an inscrutable dance. The scars left by loss and doubt have turned into dark threads on a radiant body confident in its next step.{/n}

L'aura de martyr qui l'entourait a laissé place à un halo de calme détermination tandis que ses mécadendrites se balancent avec grâce, comme si elles esquissaient quelque pas d'une danse impénétrable. Sur son corps irradiant d'une inébranlable assurance, les cicatrices de la perte et du doute ne sont plus que de fines entailles sombres.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}El aspecto del tecnosacerdote es el de siempre... pero distinto. Su aura macabra de martirio ha dado paso a una profunda expresión de calma y resolución. Sus mecadendritas se mueven con la elegancia de una danza enigmática. Las cicatrices provocadas por la pérdida y la duda se han convertido en surcos oscuros en un cuerpo que rebosa confianza de cara al futuro.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest looks the same as before... yet different. His morbid aura of martyrdom has given way to a calm and powerful halo of purposefulness. His mechadendrites move with the grace of an inscrutable dance. The scars left by loss and doubt have turned into dark threads on a radiant body confident in its next step.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El aspecto del tecnosacerdote es el de siempre... pero distinto. Su aura macabra de martirio ha dado paso a una profunda expresión de calma y resolución. Sus mecadendritas se mueven con la elegancia de una danza enigmática. Las cicatrices provocadas por la pérdida y la duda se han convertido en surcos oscuros en un cuerpo que rebosa confianza de cara al futuro.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Techpriester sieht dich genau so an wie zuvor ... aber doch anders. Seine morbide Aura des Märtyrertums ist einem ruhigen, mächtigen Glanz der Entschlossenheit gewichen. Seine Mechadendriten bewegen sich mit der Anmut eines unergründlichen Tanzes. Die von Verlust und Zweifel hinterlassenen Narben sind zu dunklen Spuren auf einem strahlenden Körper geworden, der sich seines nächsten Schritts vollkommen sicher ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest looks the same as before... yet different. His morbid aura of martyrdom has given way to a calm and powerful halo of purposefulness. His mechadendrites move with the grace of an inscrutable dance. The scars left by loss and doubt have turned into dark threads on a radiant body confident in its next step.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Techpriester sieht dich genau so an wie zuvor ... aber doch anders. Seine morbide Aura des Märtyrertums ist einem ruhigen, mächtigen Glanz der Entschlossenheit gewichen. Seine Mechadendriten bewegen sich mit der Anmut eines unergründlichen Tanzes. Die von Verlust und Zweifel hinterlassenen Narben sind zu dunklen Spuren auf einem strahlenden Körper geworden, der sich seines nächsten Schritts vollkommen sicher ist.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tekno Rahip, önceki hâliyle aynı görünse de bir farklılık mevcut. Dehşet verici şehitlik aurası, yerini bir amaca sahip olmanın sakinliğine ve kudretli halesine bırakmış. Mekadentritleri, esrarlı ve zarif bir dans sergiliyor. Kayıp ve şüphe kaynaklı yara izleri; bir sonraki adımından emin olan, ışıltılı bir bedendeki birer karanlık çizgiden ibaret kalmış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest looks the same as before... yet different. His morbid aura of martyrdom has given way to a calm and powerful halo of purposefulness. His mechadendrites move with the grace of an inscrutable dance. The scars left by loss and doubt have turned into dark threads on a radiant body confident in its next step.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tekno Rahip önceki hâliyle aynı görünüyor ancak yine de farklı. Dehşet verici şehitlik aurası, yerini bir amaca sahip olmanın sakinliğine ve kudretli halesine bırakmış. Mekadentritleri esrarlı ve zarif bir dans sergiliyor. Kayıp ve şüpheden kaynaklı yara izleri, bir sonraki adımından emin olan ışıltılı bir bedendeki birer karanlık çizgiye dönüşmüş.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
